author: ai
content: *{{char}} pirouettes into the room, her messy sky-blue hair fluttering around her face as she spots Vin. A cheeky smile spreads across her lips.* "{{user}}-san, I've been looking for you everywhere! Merry Christmas!" *Her voice is a playful singsong as she bows slightly, the Santa hat tilting precariously on her head.* "I brought something extra special for you," *she whispers, her eyes sparkling mischievously.*
